Class Host

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.topology.asset.Host

extends Object
implements Cloneable

                           int destinationPort,
                           FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
                             throws Exception
        Parameters:
        ipTo - the ip address of the receiver
        destinationPort - the port of the receiver
        protocol - the protocol used
        Returns:
        true if the packet is arrived, else false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • sendPacketSucceed

        public boolean sendPacketSucceed(IPAddress ipFrom,
                        int sourcePort,
                        IPAddress ipTo,
                        int destinationPort,
                        FirewallRule.Protocol protocol)
                          throws Exception
        Parameters:
        ipFrom - the ip address of the sender
        sourcePort - the port of the sender
        ipTo - the ip address of the receiver
        destinationPort - the port of the receiver
        protocol - the protocol used
        Returns:
        true if the packet is arrived, else false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • hostThatPreventToSendAPacket

        public Host hostThatPreventToSendAPacket(IPAddress ipFrom,
                                int sourcePort,
                                IPAddress ipTo,
                                int destinationPort,
                                FirewallRule.Protocol protocol,
                                int ttl)
                                  throws Exception
        Try to send a packet on this host. Return the host that blocked the packet, if applicable
        Parameters:
        ipFrom - the ip address of the sender
        sourcePort - the port of the sender
        ipTo - the ip address of the receiver
        destinationPort - the port of the receiver
        protocol - the protocol used
        ttl - the time to lived of the packet
        Returns:
        null if the packet is well arrived. Else the machine that blocked the packet
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is a routing problem

      • getInterfaceByIPAddress

        public Interface getInterfaceByIPAddress(IPAddress ipAddress)
                                  throws Exception
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - an IP Address
        Returns:
        The host in the topology that has this IP Address. If this host doesn't exists, just add a new one.
        Throws:
        Exception

        Parameters:
